LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArmorPad.label: armor Pad
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArmorPad.description: A heavy shoulder armor mounted on an exosuit frame.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_MissilePod.label: Demolish Missile Pod
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_MissilePod.description: A missile pod module that attach on variety of weapon platforms, Capable of loading and firing four infrared guided missiles for anti-fortification use.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_MissilePodPlus.label: Missile Pod Plus
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_MissilePodPlus.description: A missile pod module that attach on variety of weapon platforms, it is heavier but capable of loading double amount of missiles.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SmokeLauncher.label: Smoke launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SmokeLauncher.description: A simple remote-controlled launcher capable of loading smoke shells and providing accurate cover.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_StugnaLauncher.label: Stugna launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_StugnaLauncher.description: A Dragoon shoulder launcher that holds two stugna missiles. It is effective against heavy mechs and even tanks. However, a long aiming time and a clear line of sight are required to lock on target.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SwarmMissilePod.label: Swarm rocket Pod
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SwarmMissilePod.description: A Rocket pod module that contains multiple high-explosive rocket rounds, can use its high fire rate to cover an large area.
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_HellFire.label: hellfire missile
LanguageData.DMS_Module_ArmorPad.label: armor Pad
LanguageData.DMS_Module_ArmorPad.description: A heavy shoulder armor mounted on an exosuit frame.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_MissilePod.label: Missile Pod
LanguageData.DMS_Module_MissilePod.description: A missile pod module that attach on variety of weapon platforms, Capable of loading and firing four infrared guided missiles for anti-fortification use.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_MissilePodPlus.label: Missile Pod Plus
LanguageData.DMS_Module_MissilePodPlus.description: A missile pod module that attach on variety of weapon platforms, it is heavier but capable of loading double amount of missiles.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_SmokeLauncher.label: Smoke launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Module_SmokeLauncher.description: A simple remote-controlled launcher capable of loading smoke shells and providing accurate cover.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_StugnaLauncher.label: Stugna launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Module_StugnaLauncher.description: A Dragoon shoulder launcher that holds two stugna missiles. It is effective against heavy mechs and even tanks. However, a long aiming time and a clear line of sight are required to lock on target.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_SwarmMissilePod.label: Swarm rocket Pod
LanguageData.DMS_Module_SwarmMissilePod.description: Rocket pod contains multiple HE rockets, can use its high fire rate to cover an large area.
